Author: SHossain#0007
Content: You will not receive any reward if you hold your Komodo in exchanges, pools and Ledger HW wallet. Keep 10 KMD or more in an address under your control, where you own the privkey for the address.

Content: VRSC is basd on komodod and it had an estimated 10,000+ nodes recently. it uses the bitcoin protocol code that was in zcash, which got it from 0.11 bitcoin. so whatever node limits bitcoin has, which is unlimited
